attributes.action: see that Orange Halls in Ulster and across the British Isles are protected
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition calls upon our Prime Minister to see that our Orange Halls and heritage is protected in the wake of recent attacks on halls owned and maintained by the Orange Order. Attacks are not only an attack on Orange property but on Orange heritage and Protestantism.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Northern Ireland Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
